definition[0]: to keep asking someone to do something, or to keep complaining to someone about their behaviour, in an annoying way
example[1]: Nadia’s been nagging me to fix the lamp.
example[2]: She keeps nagging me about my weight.
example[3]: He’s always nagging at Paula for wearing too much makeup.
definition[1]: to make someone feel continuously worried or uncomfortable
example[5]: a problem that had been nagging at him for days
definition[2]: a person who keeps complaining or asking someone to do something, in an annoying way
definition[3]: a horse, especially one that is old or in bad condition
